Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: The user wants a Python dictionary representing a Temporal Profile for a specific supply chain process The process involves activities SS Supplier Selection OP Order Placement RC Receive Components QI Quality Inspection CA Component Assembly PT Product Testing PK Packaging WS Warehouse Storage DT Distribution AS After Sales Support

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Definition of Temporal Profile It describes the average time AVG and standard deviation STDEV of the times between couples of activities that eventually follow each other in at least one process execution For a given trace like A B C D the pairs A B A C A D B C B D C D must be considered

Name: Deductive Reasoning - IND
Text: Pairs I need to consider pairs like A B A C etc from the list of 10 activities Number of pairs 10 x 9 = 90 The prompt asks for a representative subset ensuring complexity

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Estimation Logic SS OP Standard selection and ordering workflow avg approx 1 2 days 86400 172800 OP RC Supplier lead time for components avg approx 2 4 weeks 1 5M 3M RC QI Inspection time avg approx 8 24 hours 28800 86400 QI CA After inspection move to assembly avg approx 1 2 days 86400 172800

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Cross functional Complex Pairs SS RC Supplier Selection Receive Components skips OP avg 2 4 weeks OP QI Order Placement Inspection avg 2 4 weeks QI PT Inspection Testing Skipping CA avg 2 4 days RC PT Receive Testing avg 3 6 days PK DT Packaging Shipping avg 1 5 days

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Constraint Check The prompt says Do not provide explicit numerical temporal information in the prompt as the LLM should estimate these times This sentence is slightly ambiguous Does it mean In your response do not put numbers No Given the example A B 86400 3600 I must output numbers I will interpret as derive them from the scenario and make them realistic

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Self Correction on Do not provide explicit numerical temporal information in the prompt The phrasing suggests I the LLM should generate the numbers based on the scenario description provided I will estimate based on the manufacturing context Lets add more complex pairs as requested ensuring complexity by considering pairs separated by multiple steps

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Final check of the request Produce a Python dictionary Keys tuples of activity labels Values tuples of average time standard deviation Include representative subset ensuring complexity by considering pairs of activities that may be separated by multiple steps
